function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High transmission of respiratory viruses among younger children","Impact":"Increased risk of respiratory illness and pneumonia in younger children","Mitigation":"Implementation of hygienic measures aimed at younger children","Technologies":"Hygienic measures, such as handwashing and disinfection","People":"Younger children","Owner":"Parents, caregivers, and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Potential for confounding in studies evaluating reduced transmission of respiratory viruses","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of the effectiveness of public health measures","Mitigation":"Careful consideration of potential confounding factors and study designs","Technologies":"Data analysis and study design methods","People":"Researchers and public health authorities","Owner":"Researchers and public health authorities"},{"Description":"High transmission of SARS epidemic in China, Singapore, and Vietnam in 2003","Impact":"Significant risk of widespread transmission and outbreak of SARS","Mitigation":"Implementation of public health measures to curb the spread of SARS","Technologies":"Public health interventions, such as quarantine and contact tracing","People":"Population in affected regions","Owner":"Public health authorities and government"}]}
